unnormalised: Planning a trip to Kerala? You might wanna prep your wallet! Recent reports indicate that travel expenses have seen a significant hike of about 15% compared to last year. This means your budget needs a bit of prepone-ing!
normalised: Planning a trip to Kerala? You might wanna prep your wallet! Recent reports indicate that travel expenses have seen a significant hike of about fifteen percent compared to last year. This means your budget needs a bit of prepone-ing!

unnormalised: For instance, a houseboat stay in Alleppey, which used to cost around ₹8000 per night, is now averaging at Rs. 9200. Similarly, auto-rickshaw fares in Kochi have jumped by roughly ₹30-₹50 per trip. Tourist spots like Munnar are also seeing increased entry fees and higher prices for local handicrafts. Don't forget to factor in the inflated cost of that masala chai!
normalised: For instance, a houseboat stay in Alleppey, which used to cost around rupee eight thousand per night, is now averaging at rupees nine thousand two hundred. Similarly, auto-rickshaw fares in Kochi have jumped by roughly rupee thirty to rupee fifty per trip. Tourist spots like Munnar are also seeing increased entry fees and higher prices for local handicrafts. Do not forget to factor in the inflated cost of that masala chai!

unnormalised: Experts advise travelers to book accommodations and transportation in advance to snag better deals. Also, consider exploring lesser-known destinations within Kerala to avoid the tourist traps and keep your expenses within budget. Who knows, maybe you'll find a hidden gem and save a few Rs. in the process!
normalised: Experts advise travelers to book accommodations and transportation in advance to snag better deals. Also, consider exploring lesser-known destinations within Kerala to avoid the tourist traps and keep your expenses within budget. Who knows, maybe you will find a hidden gem and save a few rupees in the process!
